name: New Year Postcard
description:
A short, beautiful, New Year's game! =)

Indirect control puzzle platformer.

You need to help the Christmas tree decorations get to the New Year tree. To create a New Year card and save it on your device!

Controls: mouse, touch.

Google Play:

You can see that an advertisement has been added to the Android version of the game, but you can only see it if you want to (the "Say" Thank you "button). There will be no banners or before/during/after the level.

Localization:

- English, Russian

At the first start, the language is determined depending on the language in the OS. In the settings you can change.

Settings:

  • Full screen mode
  • Volume
  • Animation speed
  • Language
  • "Reset progress" button

Tools:

  • GDevelop 5;
  • Affinity Designer;
  • GarageBand;
  • ProTools.
